snippet: A decadeslong dispute is apparently resolved with the assessment that a painting owned by the National Trust in Britain is a self-portrait by Rembrandt.
abstract: A decadeslong dispute is apparently resolved with the assessment that a painting owned by the National Trust in Britain is a self-portrait by Rembrandt.

headline.main: Turns Out That Guy in the Painting Really Is Rembrandt, Analysts Say
headline.print_headline: Experts Say Painting Is a Rembrandt (Himself)
